text: Stefanie's work on our enterprise risk framework was exceptional. She brought both deep GRC knowledge and the ability to make it practical and usable for our organization. Her stakeholder management skills were particularly impressive - she built consensus across business units that had previously been unable to agree on risk definitions. The risk dashboard she delivered has become an essential tool for board oversight. Highly recommend Stefanie for any organization looking to mature their risk and compliance capabilities.

Working with Stefanie on our cross-border monitoring project was a masterclass in dimensional modeling. She not only built a technically excellent solution but took the time to explain the design decisions so our team could maintain and extend it. Her Power BI work is production-quality with proper error handling and clear documentation. She balances technical excellence with pragmatic delivery - a rare combination. Would absolutely work with her again.

Stefanie led our internal audit of IT general controls and the quality of her work was outstanding. Her findings were thorough well-evidenced and presented in a way that made it clear what needed to be done and why. She built credibility with our technical teams through her domain knowledge while also communicating effectively with our board. The remediation roadmap she provided was practical and risk-based. Excellent auditor and consultant.

Stefanie's contribution to our governed analytics platform design was invaluable. She understood both the technical requirements and the governance constraints and designed an architecture that satisfied both. Her ability to facilitate discussions between our data engineers and compliance team was key to getting alignment. The platform we built based on her design has enabled us to scale analytics while maintaining appropriate controls. Highly skilled enterprise architect.

I had the pleasure of working with Stefanie on a complex stakeholder alignment initiative. She facilitated a workshop series that finally got our business IT and compliance teams on the same page after months of misalignment. Her approach was structured but flexible and she created an environment where people felt heard. The initiative that had been stalled for 6 months is now progressing smoothly. She's an excellent facilitator and consultant.

Stefanie's regulatory change impact assessment was exactly what we needed. She took a complex new regulation and broke it down into clear implications across our organization. Her enterprise architecture perspective meant she caught impacts that our siloed teams would have missed. The executive decision pack she prepared gave our leadership the information they needed to make informed trade-offs. Professional thorough and business-focused. Highly recommend.
